#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
const char fi[] = "DCE04.INP";

int min(int a, int b){ return a>b?b:a; }

void solve()
{
    int T;
    int t,m,w,c;
    int children, men, women;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    while (T--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d%d%d",&t,&m,&w,&c);
        children = men = women = 0;
        // c/4 <= a+b => 5c/4 <= n
        children = min(c, t*4/5);
        // assume
        men = m;
        women = min(w, 2*men);
        // got enough children
        children = min(children, (men+women)*4);
        t -= children;
        // a+b <= t, b/2 <= a => 3b/2 <= t
        women = min(women, 2*t/3);
        men = min(men, t-women);
        printf("%d %d %d\n", men, women, children);
    }
}

int main()
{
    //freopen(fi,"r", stdin);
    solve();
    return 0;
}
